Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP14.client.view.cli

Class UIWorker

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP14.client.view.cli.UIWorker
public class UIWorker
extends java.lang.Object
Represent a Worker and all of its binding to the owner (Player) and a board cell.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private UICell cell  
    private int id  
    private UIPlayer player  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    UIWorker​(int id, UIPlayer player)
    Constructor of UIWorker.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    UICell getCell()
    Get the cell this worker is standing on right now.
    int getId()
    Get the worker id.
    UIPlayer getPlayer()
    Get this worker owner (a player).
    void remove()
    Remove a worker from the board This is useful to remove workers of player that lost the game
    void setCell​(UICell cell)
    Set the cell this worker should stand on.
    void unsetCell()
    Removed the assigned cell from this worker, removing it temporarily from the board.

  • Field Details

    • id

      private final int id

    • player

      private final UIPlayer player

    • cell

      private UICell cell

  • Constructor Details

    • UIWorker

      public UIWorker​(int id, UIPlayer player)
      Constructor of UIWorker. Create a worker by passing an unique ID and the Player that owns this worker.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of this worker (typically 0 or 1)
      player - reference to the owner

  • Method Details

    • getId

      public int getId()
      Get the worker id.
      Returns:
      the worker id

    • getPlayer

      public UIPlayer getPlayer()
      Get this worker owner (a player). It should never be null. No Ronin Workers thanks.
      Returns:
      the player that owns this worker

    • getCell

      public UICell getCell()
      Get the cell this worker is standing on right now. It may be null if this worker is being unset by either the cell or the player, meaning it's being moved, for example.
      Returns:
      the cell

    • setCell

      public void setCell​(UICell cell)
      Set the cell this worker should stand on. It may be null if you want to unset this worker, but to do that please use unsetCell().
      Parameters:
      cell - the target cell

    • unsetCell

      public void unsetCell()
      Removed the assigned cell from this worker, removing it temporarily from the board. This is useful to perform moves, for example.

    • remove

      public void remove()
      Remove a worker from the board This is useful to remove workers of player that lost the game
